name: hackzpop 2.5
description:
Alright, i'm in.

Hackzpop 2.5 is a game, originally built in Scratch, that has you "bruteforcing" a system. Get to the end and reveal what's inside.

This is a port of the original on Scratch! Check it out here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/773646790/

Differences from the Scratch version:

- Full 16:9 HD gameplay
- 60fps (2x the original)
- Full controller support
- (very basic) Discord Rich Presence (Windows and Linux only, sorry MacOS users)

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick / D-Pad: Move
You can't stop moving!

Original Soundtrack: 

"Ilegitimate Connection" - Composed by the AI
"You're In" - Composed by the AI

Both of these tracks are available here for free: https://www.bandlab.com/hdboye/albums/31ca9d82-6876-ed11-9f5e-002248449546

This game is a continuation of my previous 2 games that i made in 2017 and 2018 respectively. Check them out here:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/144889255/
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/211356805/
